name: Rock 'n Roll Pirates
description:
Rock 'N Roll Pirates is an adventure game where you try and save members of a rock 'n roll band from (not really) cutthroat pirates. Outwit Pirates such as: Captain Crack Sparrow, Pirate Big hat, and Captain White Beard to win the game. 

Please leave us a comment on what you would like to see next for Rock 'N Roll Pirates.
